Nice resort, with great ambience. Kids will enjoy swimming the stay, with the kids zone well equipped. Restaurant serves exotic Goan dishes, though I would recommend to try the real Goan dishes in the shacks. Overall, a good property and good atmosphire, for family stay

I loved my stay at Sterlings last month. Went there for a week's trip with Family.Easy to the pocket and great experience. The staff is very cordial & food was good too!Good Job! Will surely recommend it to my friends.

Nice resort, with great ambience. Kids will enjoy the stay, with the kids zone well equipped. Restaurant serves exotic Goan dishes, though I would recommend to try the real Goan dishes in the shacks. Overall, a good property, for family stay

Been there twice as a member. Beautiful resort. Good Swimming pool but deep. Rooms very nice and big. Main thing is Food. Never had such kind of food in Mumbai where I stay. Reception staff very co operative.

Nice & small resort, all the things went perfect....room service is good. Pool is neat & clean. Activity room has various things to pass your time. Food is decent (not wow). Only concern is no lift....so prefer to take a room on lower floors.

The first thing is Room is excellent, and Front staff very good but room service and certain draw backs were very much visible.Like these are four floor building and with no Lifts and Room service was very slow and at the end of the day when you come back tired you notice that the room service guys have not done what they are supposed to and you need to call them and get things done again, but the front reception staff were very supportive and made up for the drawbacks.

It was family trip for one week. It was memorable experience @ Goa Villagio... Quality of service and comfort was excellent..Staff co-operation and guidance was very good. Transportation can be arranged from resort itself since outsiders are too costly... over all experience at the resort is awesome.

Its a really good resort to spend some good time in GOA.In shorter its a value for money. It is located at a peaceful South Goa location. Nearby beach is Colva beach which is far superior and less crowded than North Goa Beaches. Although North has its own good things and they can't be missed but it is the south Goa which will give you the real Goan feel. Villagio is a well maintained ,neat and clean resort.

The hotel has a series of building on a well manicured property. As its a smaller resort, its less crowded. It's away from the main colva beach and the closest beach front is a bit of a way alway; regardless the pool and layout make for a relaxed feel

We stayed here in march 2013, the place was clean and staff were very friendly and attentive. The breakfast buffet was just passable but the restaurant was poor. Visit Colva for some good munch.We would recommend it to people who want to shun the hustle and bustle of the north and do not mind taking some sort of transport to visit anything. Avoid if you can the cabs outside the hotel, we befriended a tut tut driver in Colva who was only a phone call away.

We were two couples and had 3 night stay at the hotel.As a sterling member two room cost us 6000Rs for 3 nights which was very cheap.We were hardly in the hotel.Roaming out in the beaches(10mins walk),Casinos and Dudhsagar Waterfalls.I found the staff was very friendly.Swimming pool was very big and clean.In house dining was good and rooms were very clean.View from the rooms is okay except if get a pool view room.Had a great time in Villagio Inn and Goa

This is a nice property affilited to Sterling, away from city in a small village of Betalbalim, the beach is 10 minute walk from hotel. The staff at hotel is great..right from the front office to the house keeping to the Food & Beverage.special mention for the executive Chef Sydeny D'souza, very friendly and warm. My son still remembers him as a friend.

a good and calm resort in a peaceful environment. Visited the resort as a member. The resort was recently unpgraded and maintained neatly. Staff are co-operative. The taxi and bike facility are available for hire outside the hotel for a reasonable fare. The negative is cost of food which is abnormal and not worth of the amount spent.

A good resort, located at a calm place, away from city hustle.The staff is very co-operative. Even the travel helpdesk was very supportive.However, restaurant service and food variety was very poor.Few more indoor games for kids are need to keep the kids busy.Overall excellent place to stay and relax.

Villagio inn is a picturesque resort with nice rooms spaciously laid out. Room has a wide balcony where one can sit and relax with drinks. The dining area is lovely with comfortable indoor and outdoor seating. The food in the restaurant was one of the best we tasted in the recent past. It is very pleasant to walk around the neighbourhood. Overall the stay was memorable. The staff are very friendly and highly responsive to customers.

The Sterling Holidays Villagio is a great hotel with excellent service. Albeit a bit far away (60 kms) from all the North Goa madness this is a hotel ideal to unwind and relax from the relentless partying in Goa. Rooms are clean, beds and pillows are really soft and the washrooms are also clean. The room service is always good and the staff is always cordial. Food served is also quite good. The bar is right by the pool and you also have a nice minibar to sort you out while you're chilling in your room.

Excellent service.Very helpful staff at reception and else where.Rooms are very comfortable and kept clean. House keeping is commendable.Restaurant menu needs some improvement though Chefs and staff try to help .Vegetarian menu can be augmented.Beach is closeby and clean. Over all ,very good experience R N Mehta

Excellent hotel at a peaceful location. Friendly and efficient staff and very well maintained. An extra plus for the cleanliness of the rooms. Pleasant pool area. The staff at vthe reception are wonderful and very helpful. Drawbacks were mainly connected to the restaurant that had adjusted the breakfasts to the many Russian tourists leaving us that want Indian food in India with rather limited options.Martin & Nighet

I have been to several Sterling properties across India and this one in Goa has to be one of the best. The rooms are neat, well maintained, the resort provides good indoor games and a well kept swimming pool. One big concern I had was the bar closes at 10 pm which is ridiculous for a city like Goa. Room service is decent but you don't get anything after 10 pm. The food menu is also pricey. Overall, a good place to stay with family.

Good place and ambiance, food good. 10 min walk to beach, with clean white sand.Need to improve on price for quality in restaurant. Improve indoor activities. need to have spa or club.Vehicle rental are very expensive. Need to have own vehicle to go around.

The resort is in south goa very close to bealbatim beach, we stayed at the resort for 2 nights and the stay was comfortable and staff courteous. Food options are very less, either you need to drive to Colva beach which is a good 15 min drive or martins corner.. Resort food is average..

we had stayed here in june this year. rooms are good,well maintained. as with all sterling resorts, this too is situated away from the main city. there is betalbetim beach just 10 min from the resort. then there is colva beach some 20 min away, where one can engage in water sports.basically its a nice place to relax. better if u hav your own vehicle. we dint try much of food in the hotel. do visit martin's corner,one of the best restaurent in south goa.

It was a great experience at Sterling's Villagio. It is a beautiful property with all the modern amenities. Nice pool, with a separate one for kids, restaurant with good ambience, bar in front of the pool, activity area for the kids and most of all a very helpful team of people with a please all attitude.Of course since it is in South Goa, you are sitting around 40 kms from Panaji. But again Colva Beach is just around 4 km where you find all the water sports.A very good option for someone who just wants to relax.

Pros:-Near to beach, 10mins walking distance - beach is very quite and superb almost white sand.-south goa- Very cheap if you are RCI or Sterling member-Pool was well maintain.Cons:- Service (WORST)- need to go to COLVA for dinner- hotel restaurant wasn't that good rather over charged.- ZERO % hospitality.- Nothing was free, even to play with volleyball was been charged.- Even Sugar packet was charged @ 60 bucks - Over charged TAXI and Rented Sctoor

This is a relatively new property and hence well maintained. Lots of activities for the kids so that they can be engaged . Very near to the Betabatim beach , which is unexplored and hance less crowded. Veg food was excellent and recommended. Nice pool and courteous staff .

We had a great 3 day stay. the resort is tucked away in a quiet place, about 5-6km from the murgao bus station. Has a pool and a restaurant. The staff are friendly and courteous but are slow. Housekeeping can be improved. The resort is close to the beach (10 minutes). The beach has good shacks and some water sports too. 20mts walk on the beach to reach Colva and you can see the water sports activity.

just returned from 2 week stay at this hotelthe rooms are first class the staff are wonderfull jan and i would defineately return in fact hoping to in marchwe rate this hotel 9 out of tenit would have gat a ten but for some small issues regarding cateringdefineately worth a visit

Place is very good , very much next to river and ambience is good & food is very tasty. Good maintenance of the place. Good for one or max two day visit. Not to many activities except for the pool ( small). Too many power cuts and Ac doesn't work during that time( only disappointment).

Excellent resort with outstanding service and facilities. Front view of my room a beautiful pond and from balcony coconut trees covering river godavari. Had wide spread of breakfast in the coffee shop consist of south indian , continental and american breakfast. Swimming pool facing godavari river ahh ni words for that superb view. Special appreciation to Mr. Tulasiram Resort manager who has given warm welcome and hospitality and kudos to his entire team.

We had been to Dindi for 3 days holiday stayed in The Sterling Resort. The resort is located in the banks of river Godavari fully surrounded by coconut trees. Food was excellent. The staff @ hotel is extra courteous and helpful, particularly Mr. Rajesh F&B Manager of the resort hospitality is very Good. We had a great holiday there.

One word i can think of being at this place is "wow" a truly mesmerizing experience, The rooms are wonderful the central lake ,the river by, the swimming pool have been designed to last a great memory for everyone, Food was really good and the stay is worth every penny spent. If you keep visiting places for a relaxation, trust me this is must visit place, Make sure you make bookings for a suite and stay a royal life in there

recently went there with my friends and enjoyed a bit, its a cool place for kids but not for grown guys. but sure u will enjoy the swimming and boating rides they provide.... its a lonely place. nothing around it. thats a lil problem

This is best I have ever been to, this has a perfect combination of natural and urban infrastructure. Situated beside godavari river. House boat is also available for a full day. If you don't want to stay u can take 50₹ ticket and can have a look around

Hospitality is worst except restaurant. Room service and response is utter worse. No arrangements from the resort like boating and other activities. On an over all, i would rate it as best place to go for wrong resort.

This property is like heaven with hell of services..... "Services every where are low grade"....... Be it at restaurant or pool or room service all in vain..... But the best part is the location it's really awesome, it overcomes all these hurdles

This is a very good getaway for the weekend. We were here for an evening. This place is good for any type of activities. There is a nice play area for the kids. The food is good. This place would be best just after the rains as the drive around the place is also great

What a good place for relaxation I have ever seen. Food is also very tasty . Restaurant and room maintainance are clean. The beauty of river Godavari is very pleasant to see . Fresh air and relaxing swimming pool . The design of resort is very nice and river view and lake view very nice. Near by antarvedi temple and the place where Godavari meets the bay Bengal is beautiful place.  Must visit place in Andhra ...

I visited this resort in the month of Jan 2016 and stayed for two days 15th to 17th Jan along with my wife and son. It is maintained spotless clean. The service levels from each and every employee was par excellent. You can forget everything during your stay here.We are not satisfied for only staying for 2 days. Hence, Planning to visit and stay for more days in this month. Wonderful resort with dedicated staff.

Excellent place by the side of the Godavari. Helpful staff, good food ,excellent ambience. Rooms are comfortable and amenities are good. Good evening activities and those keen on adventure can also go for long walks .

A great place and a beautiful setting on the banks of River Godavari.Good and clean rooms. There is a lot of activity in the resort. A nice swimming pool. Table tennis. Indoor games. The GM has been very good. Very innovative thinking of having a resort here. I think the first resort of Sterling in Andhra Pradesh. Ideal for conferences. Even for honey moon couples. A family resort also.Would like to visit once again due to its ambience.Good luck

Very good hospitality, clean rooms, excellent service, tasty food, green resort, what else can we ask, thoroughly enjoyed the stay, special mention to the staff. They ensure that the guest feels at home .pool and outdoor activities was very nice.,,it's a little away from road, so very very calm and peaceful

We have planned to spend a vacation for new year in dindi by the godavari river. The moment we went in we could see the lotus pond which attracts each and every one. The way they have welcomed us, reception staff is extremely freindly. What ever u want they are there ryt in front of u in 10 mins. We had a party on 31st nyt. Food was ok ok according to the price which we paid for couple dinner on 31st . Rest every thing was great.

We were 4 couples staying in the resort Dindi by Godavari of Sterling. The property is outstanding and the best we saw in the Sterling Resorts. The lay our, greenery lotus flower clad man made pool really were enthralloing and pleasing the our eyes. We said " WOW - what a fine resort "Staff were very professional and caring. We are very happy with their personalized attention in every aspect to make us happy . I told my wife " we have to come here every year !!

We came their kitty party and we enjoyed a lot with kitty members.its is a very nice place for visiting place. it is a lovely place by enjoying near godavari river and makes the mind very cool and pleasant

We spent 2 nights here....the place was just OK....was expecting a far better experience looking at the fact that this place is run by Sterling....and for the price being charged which is double of what APTDC charges at the Coconut grove which is right besides this one.....the SPA was nice and well managed. The rates for food was exorbitant and the taste below par....

We as a group of 60 people from palakol visited the property on business purpose , it was really good to see the property like this existing in our location. Food was exceptionally well , service from the arrival time to till we vacate the place was outstanding. Fun activities specially in the lawns for the group organised by the team was entertaining.We will certainly recommend this beautiful place to our friends & family members .

Good place to take rest and enjoy nature beauty in banks of the river Godavari. Scenic beauty from the rooms. Has a good swimming pool. Staff are good and helpful. Good food from restaurant as per our choice. Few Temple to visit nearby Antervedi near beach also Sagar Sangamam. Another Temple Uppanapalli. Also excursion by boat in godavari river to Anterwadi beach is available. Great place to enjoy and good holiday activities including Karoke. Must visit place

Location was good, view from the room was awesome. food was good. suggestion: The approach road for the hotel should be improved. more sign boards should be placed.The resturant service was good but has scope of improvement. The overall experience was good.

Clean comfortable rooms that nurture relaxed family times. Very hospitable staff. Great sunrises & sunsets. Efficient spa. Practical restaurant eager to please clients. Swimming pool , adventure activities, landscaping, boating etc to keep is happy. Great place to go relax for 3 or 4 days.

One of the latest and best resorts acquired and operated by Sterling. The rooms are great. The interiors and resort setting is really nice. Enjoyed the service at the spa. Food could do with some improvements, specially desserts. Service was truly with a smile. Missed the absence of laundry service. Boating in river godavari was great so was the walk in the Rice fields. The destination in terms of sightseeing is nothing much.

Exceptional superb ambience... Very Clean rooms ... Awesome scenery.... Breakfast is good ...but lunch and dinner is ok..and majority of the dishes r a repeat... Not freshly i guess.... But overall a very relaxing and soothing and quite location.....

A beautiful resort just by the godavari , roughly 280 kms from vizag , rooms are spacious , well maintained , highly courteous and accommodative staff , prithviraj , oppili , Rajesh made the stay a pleasant one , food is too good , fun activities were nice , the design or layout is phenomenal , antarvedi Sri Lakshmi Narasimha Swami temple is just 25 kms from this place and is a must visit .

Superrrr Awesome place to visit, fully satisfied without any compromise for any issues. Manager of the Resort Mr.Tulasiram is very very excellent n humble person who vl help n guide us for any issue or requirement & no words for other staff who are very very co-operative in all aspects. Should visit this place at least once in lifetime.

We stayed for 3 nights & 4 days ,Neat & clean rooms,The staff were very friendly-specially Mr.Tulasiram,Ravi & Mintu ,good food.Surprisingly no mosquito's though the resort is surrounded by ponds N agricultural fields.

It was one of the beautiful resort in India,the rooms were neat & big in size,the location of resort was good ,and the lily pond was amazing,the service in restaurants was good and they were good in your demands

In the month of October, 2015 my friend's family members and my self visiting the Sterling Resorts (By the Godavari). In the Entrance of the Resorts and Center of the Resorts is very awesome. Also the treatment of Resorts Staff and Restaurant Staff treating like family members and supporting well to all my members. I once again thankful to Resort's Manager and supporting Staff for a great trip to my family members.

Dear Fiends I recently visited this resort and liked it very much. The location on the bank of Godavari river in the middle of Coconut trees it is really awesome. The Lotus Pond is fantastic and worth seeing it. Food in the restaurant is not up to the mark. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Swimming pool and pool area is very nice. A very good place to visit in group.

Beautiful resort, Supporting and helpful team ( Mr. Teja and Mr. Swaroop) and awesome food.. The lotus pond is eye catching and the swimming pool which is adj-cent to Godavari river is one of the beautiful experience. A perfect place for all kind of travelers ( couples, family, friends, lone travelers ). One of the best part is the activity center ( Mr. Hari) so energetic and involves every one in the activity. All together wonderful & memorable experience.

My wife went with a group of 24 ladies made a weekend trip to this place.. After she came back she realized that she left phone charger at the resort. I called the resort management, who promptly took action on my phone call and ensured that the phone charger was sent by courier safely and without asking for any charges upfront or even after receiving the item.

Recently had a group booking at this resorts. with BIKe riders from Hyderabad, Group was extremely happy with the hospitality extended by Mr Tulsiram and Team, Great Job Man...We got individual call from all the people to thanks to the resort team...excellent food and ambience...River facing swimming pool..Lovely coconut lagoon surrounding..Pool Party Dj what else ...Awesome...Great Place to relax...New Resorts with all modern amenities....Well spacious rooms...Nice Lilly pool

I went with my family to this resort ... a quiet, pleasant and peaceful atmosphere just by the riverside Godavari! Enjoyed swimming and playing badminton.. Food at the restaurant was delicious my kid loved kichidi .. Very friendly staff - a special thanks to Mr. Hari - event coordinator at the resort brought everyone together and conducted fun activities.

The rooms and facilities are amazing. Staff is extremely courteous and helpful. Amenities are great. All meals were wonderful. However, the tea and coffee could be better. All in all, an excellent place for a holiday!

Excellent new property by Sterling. It seems that Sterling has definitely turned over a new leaf ever since it has been acquired by Thomas Cook and is now primed to compete with Club Mahindra. The rooms, the service and the locale are all top notch. Getting there is a challenge as you have the change flights to get to Rajmoudry Airport.

I was here a few days ago just to spend a couple of hours with friends and was shocked to not have heard much about this beautiful place. Its right on the river banks of godavari. We were lucky to see an amazing sunset. The food is pretty good.But not everything was available then due to Maha Pushkar happening nearby. This is an amazing getaway for a weekend. One can even plan a 5-7 days trip combined a overnight boat ride to paapikondalu.

We were there for three days. Built around a lily pond, with an amazing view of the river godavari from the balcony one of the best sterling resorts. Choice of buffet or a la carte, delicious fare. Staff go out of the way to make you feel at home. No bar licence as yet, the APTDC resort is just next door which has a bar. The APTDC resort also has speed boat rides, jet ski rides and cruises for 20 minute and 1 hr duration at reasonable rates.Perfect get away from the madding crowd

We are a group of 115 Pax went to this resort on 27th June , Our Entire Experience in this Resort simply Superb , Treditional welcome with welcome Drink , Nice Modern & spacioues Rooms ,Most Importantly Great Food & Hotel staff were amazingly helpful through out Day & Night THE BEST RESORT FOR SHORT HOLIDAY & HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

We 5 ladies(senior citizens) stayed at the newly opened Sterling Resort,Dindi,from June12 to June15.We had a real memorable stay.Room,surroundings,staffall of them need a special mention.Especially Obli and his team made our stayhome away from home.The room well maintained & staff very courteous.The rooms are situated around a pretty lily pond. the beauty of which is still colorful in our memory.

The stay was cool and pleasant they provide excellent service. They provided baby food as we told. Food quality was average and more expensive. Overall location of the hotel on the banks of Godavari is good. Need to improve in entertainment part and reduce the service cost.

Food quality is Bad. Breakfast is worst of all. The charges for food match with 7star hotels (water bottle costs you Rs79) but quality is of Dhaba hotel. Overall location of the hotel on the banks of Godavari is good.

The hotel was very nice. The activity was provided at the hotel. I had visited this hotel for family trip. There was no delay in check in and checkout in the hotel. This hotel was value for money. I don't have any suggestion for this hotel. The behaviour of the staff’s was good. All amenities were provided in the room. The hotel was located outside of the hotel. The best part of this hotel was appearance.

The hotel was under construction. The room was spacious and clean in the hotel. I didn’t face any problem to reach the hotel. The food quality and quantity was excellent. The check in and checkout was done time. The activity was not available at the hotel. I would recommend this hotel for upcoming travellers. Wi-Fi connection was not provided in the room. The parking facility was not available at the hotel.

The location of the hotel was good. The hotel was located outside of the city. The ambience of the hotel was good. There was delay in check in. The allotted room was spacious but it was not clean. All amenities were available in working condition in the room. The view from the room was good. The transportation facility was provided by the hotel but it was chargeable.

We stayed here for three nights. The renovated room was excellent. We had comfortable sleep. The food was excellent and the service in the restaurant was even better. The entrance can be improved. The front reception service can be more professional and friendlier. The first impression is very important.

Sterling resort Manali is a well maintained and peaceful property with good amenities. The view of the snow cl added hills from the resort is very beautiful. The staff here is co-operative, neat & clean rooms and the food quality is also very good. Altogether we had a comfortable and memorable stay here and would like to visit again.

We had visited Manali and had stayed at Sterling White Mist from May 8-11, 2016. The location was ideal as it was situated away from the noise and traffic of the main city. Our stay was overall pleasant. Clean and reasonably sized rooms, good dining facilities and pleasant staff. The absence of a health club and activities of indoor/ outdoor facilities for children was a disappointment as we had perceived Sterling to be a brand for family holidays similar to Club Mahindras. The air-conditioning too needs to be revamped.

I had booked my vacation based on reputed brand. But Failed to meet expection on fronts. Admintrataion has allot ed room on poor view in spite of booking very much in advance. Electrical Back up system is hopeless. Door Lock poorest. Restaurant does not have variety of food.

My stay was very comfortable at tgsi hotel and staff is also very co- operative. Value for money. My stay was for three nights. Fully reconditioning room with full of cleanliness. Room service was good and there is change of bedsheets on daily basis. I enjoyed a lot my stay there wish you to stay again.

It's good hotel, easy accessible. Location good, clean and Nice ambience, staff is good little concern with taxes which not as per gov rules of Vat 60/40. Food is very costly according to hotel, bcoz they charge as 5. 7*. Sterling must understand ...

You might not like the food here that much but rest everything else was superb. We went for our anniversary. The location was nice. The moment you wake up, you can see snow clad mountains, it was mesmerizing

Absolute waste of money. Bad setup of Sterling Properties. Less manpower, bad food, service is poor, aged people. It's too risky to stay there as no ventilation in the rooms and my kids had breathlessness. Even if complained, nothing was done.

Adjacent club mahindra.
After reading previous reviews I had mixed feelings, someone had written rooms are not as shown in pictures. 
I had booked presidential suite of snow valley resort for 1st day in manali however my wife insisted for sterling for next day.
The rooms were exactly same as shown.
Very comfortable bed (snow capped mountain view from bed) high std equipment in bathroom, overall cleanliness.
Good food & location (many hotels nearby so food anyways not an issue.

The property is newly built by even room heaters are not working and rooms are small very congested but food is average and property is also small you can hear people talking in next room so lot of thing should be improved

It was very good. We enjoyed there. And all facility was very good. My tour become memorable. We will suggest to other person to stay there. Outside look was very good. We can see snow from our room itself. I think it was very good.

The hotel had not provided the activities. The room given to me had all the amenities in it. Wi-Fi connection was not provided there. The hotel was a bit far from the city. I had no problem in locating the hotel. The hotel had served many varieties in food but we didn’t have food from the hotel. There was no delay in check in and checkout. The staff’s response was good at the hotel. The hotel was under renovation. It was a vacation trip. Laundry service was provided there. I don’t have any suggestion for the hotel. I would surely recommend this hotel to my family and friends. Parking facility was not provided in the hotel. Overall, it was a good hotel.

Location of the hotel was nice. Hotel was conveniently located. Hotel staffs were friendly, helpful and quickly respond to our request. Appearance of the hotel was modern. There was no delay in check in and checkout procedure. Room was spacious, clean and well maintained. TV, AC, geyser and other basic facility were provided in the room. The hotel was value for money. I would like to recommend the hotel to other travellers. We haven’t taken any food from the hotel. There was no delay in check in and checkout procedure. Overall I was satisfied with the hotel stay.

There was no difficulty in reaching the hotel. Everything was good in the hotel. I didn’t have any problem there. The staffs at the hotel were good. I had not observed the activities in the hotel. The appearance of the hotel was good. The amenities in the room were functioning properly. The room given to me was properly cleaned.

I had only veg food from the hotel. The food was good in this hotel. The hotel had provided the activities and I had availed that. The staffs at the hotel were good. Check in and checkout was not delayed. The hotel was not good in appearance. But the stay was good in the hotel. I would like to visit this hotel again. I had no suggestion for the hotel as I was satisfied with the hotel. I had stayed there with my family and friends.

We were given room on 2nd floor which was congested and rooms are okay neat. Bathroom is okay. They gave 500ml water bottle on day one and second day upon asking they said its chargeable and it was very rude way of answering. Fire alarm was getting activated every now and then and upon asking the answer was its because of smoke from kitchen.

I stayed at Sterling Hotel Manali in May 2015 for my honeymoon. The overall experience of my stay was awesome. Food was extremely good with lots of variety and great taste. Hotel staff was very polite & Helpful. I accidentally left my wedding ring in my laundry, which was immediately returned to me as soon as I notified the management. One of the best experience of my life.

Destination Sterling Holiday Resorts Manali is very good. Hotel interior is very good. Hotel management is also very good. Rooms very good. Waiter service is also very good. Parking facilities is very good. Games sector was good. All the experience in Sterling Holiday Resorts Manali is very good. Hotel food is good.

Last week I travelled to Manali. I was recommended by a friend to stay at the Sterling Resort White Mist. I easily got the hotel, no problems. And even my check was quick. Thanks to the robust staff. I found hotel rooms are very spacious, has a balcony, yes. Not so modern but neat and clean. Hotel food is good. View from the resort is mesmerising. We loved the stay here. I recommend tourist this hotel to stay, definitely its one the best resorts in Manali.
The hotel was good. Facility of kitchen was provided in room that enabled you to cook yourself if one wishes to.

Excellent. Happy to visit again. Also the faclity is superb in that hotel.
Location is also very good and food quality is very very good in that hotel.
good experince for manali and all this hotel and other people so it is best and tempal is good rohatag is best
overall experience with the hotel was fine, enjoyed there. hospitable staff nice ambiance and good good
The ambience of the resort was quite adorable and the rooms were very spacious with a small attatched kitchen with a microwave in it.
Good and friendly staff . Relaxing place for holiday with family.
it was nice& we njoy whole trip. local staff was very much cooperative
Wonderful...rooms food hospitality all very good...
Good. very nice food ,service & appearamce. staff is also very helpful.
It was a fantastic experience staying at Sterling White Mist, Manali. Location,room service, indoor activities was very good. Staff was very good.
Good location, good management, Very Good experience in overall

it was good experience.value for money.service and food both were good.
had a good holiday experience.enjoyed.
Over all experience is quite good but the location of resort is so so n its far frm market
Good and enjoyed. It is in a good location away from Manali
it was an unforgettable experince. looking forward to visiting again
nice place to enjoy and relax far from the daily work.
We had a good experience at the resort, except for a few inconveniences.
Great experience. Highly recommended to stay and enjoy the scenic Manali.

at sterling resort, it was good, travelling /journey was worst and very expensive.
check in and check out timings have to be changed in all resorts/hotels
It was excellent experience of enjoying snow fall, which we were not having at our local place.
It\'s awesome experience for me and also my wife. This is our Honey moon tour, so i would refer to all the new couple married please go manali..........................
The Overall experience at the Sterling was very good whether its room, food, Service & others
Overall it was a wonderful experience. Trip to manali is itself a great experience and the stay at the Hotel was an add on to it.
overall experience was very good stay was super i was in regular apartment.service was good atomshphere was superb memory i will never forget
Fantastic... It was really wow staying with them.... But regards to food i was not happy... they don;\\\'t have enough varieties from south side.
The overall experience was very good. We were given a room on FIT basis, hence the centrally heated rooms made the stay very comfortable.
I had very good time over there stay was excellent,service is good other activity is also good
I enjoyed my stay in the hotel,best in class services and other food. The room decor and location was awesome.. it was a wonderful experience.
It was good,the rooms were too good and the location is far away from the  Rohtang pass so it takes too much time to get there .
Overall experience was very good. Nice location of the resort and great food made our holidays memorable.
its a good hotel for family as well for guys with friends. overall its a good experience. they will assist for all trekkings, paraclide etc
hotel is very good ,food is good hotel sieght seeing and wonderfully and manali a hills  to ahotel window
VERY GOOD EXPERAINCE ,ROOMS ARE FINE AND FOODS ALSO FINE MANGE MENT IS ALSO GOOD
the place is very beautiful but far from the main market, the food is not good
all things are best but only food is verry mush costly
location surrounging was good near to river with hot refershemnt
It was good. The resort was clean and provided amazing views. The service was also decent.
very cordial staff and pleasant stay ,worth experiencing.food is excellent.
very good hotel i usually stay in this hotel i like service a lot the staff re very friendly.there are a few activities in the hotel .all the other thing are very good about the hotel
